meanings.definition: Occurring or existing after an accident.

meanings.sent3: After the postaccident repairs, the car seemed to have superpowers.
meanings.sent4: The postaccident changes in her life were like a fresh start.
meanings.sent5: The postaccident scene was etched in his memory forever.
